actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the River and Harbor Act of 1968, to provide for remedial works and preventive measures associated with the Cooper River Rediversion Project.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to take certain remedial and preventive measures at the Cooper River Rediversion Project, Charleston Harbor, South Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to amend the River and Harbor Act of 1968, to provide for remedial works and preventive measures associated with the Cooper River Rediversion Project.
